page.title: About
page._content:
欢迎来到食乎！
在这里，你将能体会到美食的终极奥义——食之有味。几乎所有的人都知道食物怎样去吃，但是却鲜有人知道食物从何而来。而我们要做的就是不仅让您能品尝到美味的食物，实现物质上的满足；同时帮助您了解食物的历史渊源，实现精神上的满足。
加入食乎，让我们一起带您一起食之有味！





Welcome to Food Hunter!
Here you will be able to realize the ultimate meaning of food——truly understand what you eat. Almost everybody knows how to eat food but few people know its history. What we are trying to do here is not only to fulfill your stomach but also help you dig out the history of food to fill in your culture blank.
Join Food Hunter and let us help you truly eat something!

title: About

在这里，你将能体会到美食的终极奥义——食之有味。几乎所有的人都知道食物怎样去吃，但是却鲜有人知道食物从何而来。而我们要做的就是不仅让您能品尝到美味的食物，实现物质上的满足；同时帮助您了解食物的历史渊源，实现精神上的满足。
加入食乎，让我们一起带您一起食之有味！

Welcome to Food Hunter!
Here you will be able to realize the ultimate meaning of food——truly understand what you eat. Almost everybody knows how to eat food but few people know its history. What we are trying to do here is not only to fulfill your stomach but also help you dig out the history of food to fill in your culture blank.
Join Food Hunter and let us help you truly eat something!
